Job Description

Full-time role for Marketing Specialist. Will handle tasks like market research, sales support, campaign execution, and strategy development.

  1. Conduct market research and analysis
  2. Support and execute marketing campaigns
  3. Work with sales and creative team
  4. Develop strategies for product and brand growth
  5. Analyze campaign performance and optimize results

Qualifications

  1. Strong communication and analytical skills
  2. Experience in marketing strategy and campaign planning
  3. Knowledge of beauty or cosmetic industry
  4. Experience in e-commerce or marketplace campaign
  5. Proven track record in increasing awareness or sales

See our Stories @SSGroup

SS Group offers Indonesian brands like Shellasaukia.co, SS Skin, and SS Your Make Up, featuring beauty and fashion products.
